Package: org.ysb33r.gradle.vfs.internal

[Groovy] Class CopyUtils

    • org.ysb33r.gradle.vfs.internal.CopyUtils

    • Utilities for VFS copy operations.

      Authors:
      Schalk W. Cronj√©

      1.0

        • static void copy(Logger logger, VFS vfs, java.util.Set<VfsURI> sources, VfsURI destRoot)

          Copies a set of sources to a destination, logging success along the way

          Parameters:
          logger - Logger to report progress
          vfs - Virtual file system to use
          sources - Source URIs
          destRoot - Destination destRoot URI. If it does not exit it will be created prior to starting the copy
          Since:
          1.0

        • @groovy.transform.CompileDynamic static void copyChildren(VFS vfs, VfsURI src, VfsURI destRoot)

        • static void recursiveCopy(Logger logger, VFS vfs, VfsCopySpec rootSpec, VfsURI destRoot)

          On a filesystem/scheme that can list folder contents it performs a deep (recursive) copy of all sources in a spec including all children specS. In order to keep the behaviour of normal CopySpec, the base folder of the source will be dropped from the destination path. If the contents cannot be listed, the source spec is treated as file instead resulting in any include/exclude filters being ignored.

          Parameters:
          logger - Logger to report progress
          vfs - Virtual file system to use
          rootSpec - Root copy specification
          destRoot - Destination destRoot URI. If it does not exit it will be created prior to starting the copy
          Since:
          1.0

        • static VfsURICollection recursiveDestinationList(VFS vfs, VfsCopySpec rootSpec, VfsURI root)

          Returns a set of all of the full resolved destination URIs in a copy specification

          Returns:
          Destination collection. Never null
          Parameters:
          vfs - Virtual file system to use
          rootSpec - Root copy specification
          root - Destination root URI. If it does not exit it will be created prior to starting the copy
